item.title: Deploying OpenStack Liberty with Ceph
item.description: In this example of deploying OpenStack I’ll be adding a third server that will act as our Ceph storage server. With a few config changes to openstack-ansible we will setup nova, cinder and glance to use Ceph as their backend storage systems. infra01: Lenovo ThinkServer TS140 Xeon E3-1225 v3 3.2 GHz 16GB ECC RAM 2 x 1Gb NICs IP address for em1: 192.168.88.100 IP address for br-mgmt: 172.29.236.51 IP address for br-vxlan: 172.
